product_name: Sony Action Cam Dog Harness Mount
long_description: Fasten the Sony Action Cam dog harness mount to your dog's back, snap on your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately) and be prepared to discover a crazy world from your pooch's point of view. Use the optional tilt adapter (sold separately) to get the best angle from your camera. Fits medium to large dogs (over 33 lbs.) and canine waists measuring 19.6 to 31.5 in.
short_description: Fasten the Sony Action Cam dog harness mount to your dog's back, snap on your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately) and be prepared to discover a crazy world from your pooch's point of view.
